SEARCH
Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet

Class ResourceURLConnection

java.lang.Object
java.net.URLConnection
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.ResourceURLConnection
public class ResourceURLConnection extends URLConnection
URLConnection for a resource: URL identifying a resource in a context. Supports resources in the context root, WAR file, or META-INF/resources inside JARs in WEB-INF/lib (Servlet 3.0 spec section 4.6).
Author:
Chris Burdess
